vulnerable_code: public abstract class BareBone_X509TrustManagerCanNotBypassExt implements X509TrustManager {...}
description: The custom X509TrustManager implementation BareBone_X509TrustManagerCanNotBypassExt does not perform any validation in checkClientTrusted and checkServerTrusted methods, effectively bypassing certificate validation.
recommendation: Ensure that the checkClientTrusted and checkServerTrusted methods perform appropriate certificate validation, such as checking the certificate chain and verifying the identity of the remote server.
